snippet: A wedding in Houston for a television talk-show host and an investor.
lead_paragraph: Brooke Marie Bentley and Jeffrey Phillip Gunst were married Saturday evening at St. John the Divine Episcopal Church in Houston. The Rev. Dr. Douglas W. Richnow, an Episcopal priest, performed the ceremony. The bride, 32, will continue to use her name professionally. She works in Houston as a host of ''SportsZone,'' a talk show on KUBE, a television station. She graduated cum laude from Davidson College and received a master's in journalism from the University of Southern California.
